info.name: MIDAZ
info.description: This is a swagger documentation for the Midaz Ledger API

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

query.description: JSON string to filter organizations by metadata fields
Maximum number of records to return per page
Filter organizations created on or after this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Filter organizations created on or before this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Sort direction for results based on creation date

request.description: Returns a paginated list of organizations, optionally filtered by metadata, date range, and other criteria

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Creates a new organization with the provided details including legal name, legal document, and optional address information

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Returns detailed information about an organization identified by its UUID

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Permanently removes an organization identified by its UUID. Note: This operation is not available in production environments.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Updates an organization's information such as legal name, address, or status. Only supplied fields will be updated.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

query.description: JSON string to filter ledgers by metadata fields
Maximum number of records to return per page
Filter ledgers created on or after this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Filter ledgers created on or before this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Sort direction for results based on creation date

request.description: Returns a paginated list of ledgers within the specified organization, optionally filtered by metadata, date range, and other criteria

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Creates a new ledger within the specified organization. A ledger is a financial record-keeping system for tracking assets, accounts, and transactions.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Returns detailed information about a ledger identified by its UUID within the specified organization

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Permanently removes a ledger identified by its UUID. Note: This operation is not available in production environments.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Updates a ledger's information such as name, status, or metadata. Only supplied fields will be updated.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

query.description: JSON string to filter accounts by metadata fields
Maximum number of records to return per page
Filter accounts created on or after this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Filter accounts created on or before this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Sort direction for results based on creation date

request.description: Returns a paginated list of accounts within the specified ledger, optionally filtered by metadata, date range, and other criteria

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Creates a new account within the specified ledger. Accounts represent individual financial entities like bank accounts, credit cards, or expense categories.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Returns detailed information about an account identified by its alias within the specified ledger

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Returns detailed information about an account identified by its UUID within the specified ledger

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Permanently removes an account from the specified ledger. This operation cannot be undone.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Updates an existing account's properties such as name, status, portfolio, segment, and metadata within the specified ledger

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

query.description: JSON string to filter assets by metadata fields
Maximum number of records to return per page
Filter assets created on or after this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Filter assets created on or before this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Sort direction for results based on creation date

request.description: Returns a paginated list of assets within the specified ledger, optionally filtered by metadata, date range, and other criteria

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Creates a new asset within the specified ledger. Assets represent currencies, cryptocurrencies, commodities, or other financial instruments tracked in the ledger.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Returns detailed information about an asset identified by its UUID within the specified ledger

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Permanently removes an asset from the specified ledger. This operation cannot be undone.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Updates an existing asset's properties such as name, status, and metadata within the specified ledger

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

query.description: JSON string to filter portfolios by metadata fields
Maximum number of records to return per page
Filter portfolios created on or after this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Filter portfolios created on or before this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Sort direction for results based on creation date

request.description: Returns a paginated list of portfolios within the specified ledger, optionally filtered by metadata, date range, and other criteria

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Creates a new portfolio within the specified ledger. Portfolios represent collections of accounts grouped for specific purposes such as business units, departments, or client portfolios.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Returns detailed information about a portfolio identified by its UUID within the specified ledger

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Permanently removes a portfolio from the specified ledger. This operation cannot be undone.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Updates an existing portfolio's properties such as name, entity ID, status, and metadata within the specified ledger

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

query.description: JSON string to filter segments by metadata fields
Maximum number of records to return per page
Filter segments created on or after this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Filter segments created on or before this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Sort direction for results based on creation date

request.description: Returns a paginated list of segments within the specified ledger, optionally filtered by metadata, date range, and other criteria

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Creates a new segment within the specified ledger. Segments represent logical divisions within a ledger, such as business areas, product lines, or customer categories.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Returns detailed information about a segment identified by its UUID within the specified ledger

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Permanently removes a segment from the specified ledger. This operation cannot be undone.

header.description: Authorization Bearer Token with format: Bearer {token}

request.description: Updates an existing segment's properties such as name, status, and metadata within the specified ledger

item.name: Get all balances by account id

request.description: Get all balances by account id
Get all balances
Get a Balance with the input ID
Delete a Balance with the input ID
Update a Balance with the input payload
Get all Operations with the input ID
Get an Operation with the input ID
Update an Operation with the input payload
Create or Update an AssetRate with the input details

item.name: Get an AssetRate by the Asset Code

request.description: Get an AssetRate by the Asset Code with the input details

item.name: Get an AssetRate by External ID

request.description: Get an AssetRate by External ID with the input details
Get all Transactions with the input metadata or without metadata
Create a Transaction with the input DSL file
Create a Transaction with the input payload
Create a Transaction with the input template
Get a Transaction with the input ID
Update a Transaction with the input payload
Commit a previously created transaction
Revert a Transaction with Transaction ID only
